snippet.title: Outbreak island - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Outbreak Island follows detective Howard Chapman looking into the disastrous effects of an experiment gone wrong on Erisen Island. Document your experience on the island with your camera as you explore and scavenge for supplies. You can craft weapons and find food and medicine and you can distract the mutated infected with your camera flash. Take a look at this trailer to see what all you can do in Outbreak Island.

#IGN #IGNExpo
